channel.title: Music – Lauren Christy
channel.description: Recent content in Lauren Christy on Music

item.title: Lauren Christy - Color Of The Night
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: FRIEDMAN JUD, FRONTIERE DOMINIC, CHRISTY LAUREN
KY: 8830 / KY: 7246

You and I
moving in the dark
Bodies close
but souls apart
Shadowed smiles and
secrets unrevealed
I need to know
the way you feel
I’ll give you
everything I am
And everything
I want to be
I’ll put it
in your hands
If you could open
up to me oh
Can’t we ever
get beyond this wall
‘Cause all I want
is just once
To see you
in the light
But you
hide behind
The color of
the night
I can’t go on running
from the past
Love has torn away
this mask
And now like clouds
like rain
I’m drowning and I
blame it all on you
I’m lost God
save me
I’ll give you
everything I am
And everything
I want to be
I’ll put it
in your hands
If you could open up
to me oh
Can’t we ever
get beyond this wall
‘Cause all I want
is just once
To see you
in the light
But you
hide behind
The color of
the night-

Everything I am
and everything
I want to be oh
can’t we ever
Get beyond this wall
‘cause all
I want is just once
forever and again
The waiting for you
I’m standing
In the light
But you hide behind
The color of
the night
Please
come out from
The color of
the night-
